text: The cat sat on the mat. The dog was big and brown. They played in the sun.
label: Easy

text: Sam likes to play. He has a red ball. He throws the ball far.
label: Easy

text: It is a nice day. The sky is blue. I want to go to the park.
label: Easy

text: We have a small garden. Mom grows flowers. The flowers are red and yellow.
label: Easy

text: My name is Ben. I have a brother. His name is Leo. We play games together.
label: Easy

text: The bird can fly high. It sings a sweet song. I like to watch the bird.
label: Easy

text: Reading is a good habit. It helps us learn new things. Books are our friends. We can read stories about many places.
label: Moderate

text: The solar system has eight planets. Earth is the third planet from the sun. Mars is red. Jupiter is the largest planet.
label: Moderate

text: Monkeys are smart animals. They live in jungles. They love to eat bananas. Monkeys can climb trees very well.
label: Moderate

text: Water is very important for life. We need to drink water every day. We also use water to wash and to cook our food.
label: Moderate

text: History is the study of the past. We learn about old events and famous people. This helps us understand the world today.
label: Moderate

text: Oceans are very large bodies of salt water. They cover more than 70 percent of the Earth. Many fish live in the ocean.
label: Moderate

text: Photosynthesis is the process where plants use sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide to create their own food and release oxygen into the air.
label: Difficult

text: The industrial revolution was a period of major technological, socioeconomic, and cultural change in the late 18th and early 19th centuries.
label: Difficult

text: Quantum mechanics is a fundamental theory in physics that provides a description of the physical properties of nature at the scale of atoms and subatomic particles.
label: Difficult

text: Cellular respiration is a complex set of metabolic reactions. It converts biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate (ATP), and then releases waste products.
label: Difficult

text: The separation of powers is a constitutional principle. It divides the functions of government into three branches: legislative, executive, and judicial, to prevent any one branch from becoming too powerful.
label: Difficult

text: Neuroplasticity refers to the brain's ability to reorganize itself by forming new neural connections throughout life. This allows the neurons in the brain to compensate for injury and disease.
label: Difficult
